import React, {useState} from 'react' function CreateTraining() { const [name,updateName] = useState("") const [desc,updateDesc] = useState("") const [date,updateDate] = useState("") const [start_time,updateStartTime] = useState("") const [end_time,updateEndTime] = useState("") function handleChange(e){ e.target.name === "name" ? updateName(e.target.value) : false } return (
) } export default CreateTraining
